description: Give your chilli sauce recipe a twist with the addition of mandarin. In just three steps, you'll be able to add spice and zing to your favourite dishes.
name: Mandarin & Chilli Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Coarsely chop 2 chillies and place in a food processor. Halve and deseed remaining chillies, then coarsely chop and add to food processor. Add garlic and 1/2 cup vinegar. Process until finely chopped. Juice 2 mandarins. Peel a 5cm-long strip of rind from remaining mandarin. Reserve mandarin.

Transfer chilli mixture to a large saucepan over low heat. Add sugar, juice, rind and remaining vinegar. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sugar has dissolved. Increase heat to medium-high and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes or until sauce has thickened.
Meanwhile, peel and divide reserved mandarin into segments. Cut into 1cm pieces. Remove pan from heat. Stir in mandarin pieces. Pour into sterilised jars. Seal with lid and cool.
